A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie literally ruins Star Wars. This movie strategically tears apart everything from the past just to be able to build something new. This is horrible story telling beyond all the plot holes and political agenda in this film. They ruined Luke's character completely which alone would get a horrible rating from me but this movie was just bad. Ok sure the acting and visuals were superb but the story was just soooo bad and lazy.
